protein.specific_function: Reduces the gamma-methene bridge of the open tetrapyrrole, biliverdin IX alpha, to bilirubin with the concomitant oxidation of a NADH or NADPH cofactor.

go_class.description: oxidoreductase activity, acting on the ch-ch group of donors
oxidoreductase activity, acting on the ch-ch group of donors, nad or nadp as acceptor
